TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
One word : Gravity

I wish to be a necromancer

granted. eaten by your own zombies.

I wish to be a level 99 wizard!
I wish for radial and stack 1.25 m decouplers to be in the starting parts of career.

Granted, but you skip a turn so you die

I wish to have the Death Note book

Granted, but you die when u open it.

I wish i had $23 to buy KSP.

Granted, but the website is down.

I wish for more me gusta pics.

Granted, (you want it, don't you?)

(if yes, go get your price here)

I wish that people stop being trolls

Granted. People now simply spit on each other.

I wish to unsee that picture you showed me.

granted, you wipe your memory and forget who you are.

I wish there was no r34

The internet implode because to erase the rule 34, you need to divide by 0

I wish that THENEWJOEMAMA can think twice before clicking on link posted by a psycho-bypolar-half-brony squid

Granted. I still click on them though.

I wish you could BUZZ OFF!!!

Granted but he turns into Buzz Aldrin and you corrupt time

I wish the city of ember was real

Granted. It's a city made of embers and fire, and you're trapped in it.

I wish for no more trololol

Granted he disides to move to your house and troll you everyday

I wish i was a kerbal

Granted, but you cannot go within 9001 miles of Jeb.

I wish for Michael Jackson to come back.

Granted but he is a moonwalking ghost

I wish I had a good OC (original character) for my fanfic.

One word : Molestia

I wish I never used my master ball

One word : Molestia

I wish I never used my master ball

(I prefer Lil' Miss rarity...)

Granted, what's a master ball?

I wish I still didn't have my child voice.

granted. you get a fraky super deep voice instead.

I wish for an ancient psychic tandem war elephant

Granted, it stomp you

(A master ball is this)

I wish for interior where you can walk in EVA at the KSC

Granted, but it's super laggy.

I wish for all corruption in the world to end.

granted but extraterrestrials get corrupted an take ovver our world

i wwish i nevver talked like eridan (Homestuck)

granted now you stutter uncontrollably

I wish i could like for as long as i want

Granted, but you only like rule 34 things. Huehuehue

I wish for rule 34 to be erased from my memory.

Granted. IS NOT POSSIBEL.

I wish my head didn't explode from coincidence because new Doctor Who airs on the same day as MLP season 4, 23.11.12
